answerText: long-term potentiation (or LTP)[10] CA3 cells and CA1 cells are connected by Schaffer collaterals, which are these structures. These long nerve fibers conduct impulses between neurons.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Washington, Dartmouth B, GW A | 13 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this mechanism which increases the connection strength between two neurons. Its early phase involves the incorporation of more AMPA receptors.
